comment: A relation which is reflexive and symmetric (like an equivalence relation) can use the restricted version for their reflexive part (see below), not just the ` ( _I i^i ( dom R X. ran R ) ) C_ R ` version of ~ dfrefrel2 , cf. the comment of ~ dfrefrels2 . (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 23-Aug-2021.)
